solution_line_template: In one week he drove {monday_miles}+{tuesday_miles}+{wednesday_miles}+{thursday_miles}+{friday_miles} = <<{monday_miles}+{tuesday_miles}+{wednesday_miles}+{thursday_miles}+{friday_miles}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles

He is reimbursed ${reimbursement_per_mile} per mile of travel, and he travels {total_miles} miles so he will receive {reimbursement_per_mile}*{total_miles} = $<<{reimbursement_per_mile}*{total_miles}={total_reimbursement}>>{total_reimbursement}
